text: The River Hor is a short river in the county of Norfolk, England. It runs east from its source near Felthorpe to its confluence with the River Bure near Wroxham.Ordnance Survey of Great Britain ==History== The name of the river is probably a back-formation from the name of villages that it flows through. The village of Horsford has a name meaning "ford that horses can cross", so the river's name may be formed from that. ==References== Hor
title: River Hor
